text: The Mephisto Waltz is a 1971 American horror movie directed by Paul Wendkos and based on the novel of the same name by Fred Mustard Stewart. It stars Alan Alda, Jacqueline Bisset, Barbara Perkins, Bradford Dillman, Curd JÃ¼rgens and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Paul Wendkos
title: The Mephisto Waltz
